item.title: Neocities: Create your own free website!
item.description: Neocities is a social network of 859,400 web sites that are bringing back the lost individual creativity of the web. We offer free static web hosting and tools that allow you to create your own web site. Join us! We’ve made it easy to build your web site and explore other sites.
